Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to introduce and pass and the Governor to sign, legislation requiring banking organizations to provide, at a minimum, the immediately preceding six months of financial documents following a request from authorized governmental agencies for such financial documents to help fight financial exploitation of older adults.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring banking organizations to provide, at a minimum, the immediately preceding six months of financial documents following a request for such financial documents to help fight financial exploitation of older adults.
